spell.name: Fire Bolt

components.m: 1 Chaos rune, 3 Air runes, 4 Fire runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: You crush your runes and conjure an orb of fire to hurl at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes fire damage equal to 4d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
